snippet: The police announced a record haul of 330 kilograms, more than 700 pounds, found in bottles amid a truck filled with gherkins and garlic.
abstract: German police announce they seized record haul of heroin; say 330 kilograms, more than 700 pounds, is estimated to be worth $63 million on the street.
lead_paragraph: The police announced a record haul of 330 kilograms, more than 700 pounds, found in bottles amid a truck filled with gherkins and garlic.

headline.main: German Police Seize Heroin Worth $63 Million
headline.print_headline: Germany: Police Seize Heroin Worth $63 Million
